#include<iostream>
 
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
 
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
    if(a>=b)
        {
        if(a%b==0)
            return b;
        else
            return gcd(b,a%b);
        }
        else
            return gcd(b,a);
}
 
int main()
{
    long int t,n,m,g,l,a,b;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        if(m==1||n==1)
            cout<<((n>m)?n:m)<<"\n";
        else
        {
            g=gcd(m-1,n-1);
            a=(n-1)/g;
            b=(m-1)/g;
            cout<<g+1<<"\n";
        }
 
    }
}
